features: Lightweight and Portable: Weighing only 1.08lb and folding down to a compact 15 inches, the lightweight phone light stand is effortless to carry and set up, making it perfect for on-the-go shooting and quick lighting adjustments.

Robust Load Capacity: With a high load capacity of 22lb, the iron legs of the portable light stand are engineered with a sturdy support structure, allowing for versatile angle adjustments and reliable stability even when handling heavy equipment.

Adjustable Height: This adjustable light stand can expand from 15 to 51.2 inches with 4 telescopic sections, easily lock the desired height using the knob for secure adjustments. The bottom knob structure ensures a firm and stable setup, catering to various shooting scenarios, especially ideal for outdoor use, travel, live stream and video recording.

Universal 1/4 Interface: Versatile Compatibility: Equipped with a standard 1/4-inch interface, our light stand tripod is universally compatible with a wide range of devices, including ring lights, phone mounts, cameras, reflectors, and more.

Versatile and Portable Solution: The perfect balance of lightweight design, sturdy construction, and easy height adjustment makes this compact light stand an indispensable tool for content creators, photographers, vloggers, and anyone in need of reliable and portable lighting stand support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Used these to hold LED flood lights for ice rink. Work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mini stand with 1/4" mount. Not stable when set high.
reviews.reviewText: The Tarion TLS-01 is a compact stand with a 1/4" male thread at the top. It's not a heavy duty stand but can work well for lightweight applications. For example, I added a phone mount to this stand, and it worked well as a mini desktop tripod. I found that by using this stand at a low height and on a desk or table worked best for me. Setting this stand high will require adding some weight at the bottom to prevent it from falling over.I think there are a few areas this stand could have been improved upon. For example, I think the 1/4" mount could have had a rubber pad instead of being all plastic. The legs on this stand have plastic end caps, so there is no grip when placed on a smooth surface. When I first unboxed this stand, it already had some scratches on it. Also, I don’t think this is a true light stand because it doesn't have a typical 5/8" stud with a 1/4" or 3/8” thread.For mounting lightweight items or devices, I think this can be a practical stand, but due to the small base it’s not the most stable when set high.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my ring light
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice stand. I have a ring light and my friend broke the stand that it came with. I bought this as a replacement and it's way nicer and sturdier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement for the stand that broke.
reviews.reviewText: It's taller, more durable, and more versatile than the one that came with my ring light, but broke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars stand was so light it would tip over
reviews.reviewText: The stand would hold a light and it would fall over it it went too high. Good value but not enough support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, but heavy-duty tripod!
reviews.reviewText: This tripod is not at all flimsy and can mount up to 7 pounds! It is *sturdy!* Once extended, it is rock-solid on a flat surface, and I can mount anything from a smartphone to a long-lens DSLR camera with accessories on it. Fill lights, ring lights and even a remote video projector mount easily using the standard ¼-20 threaded mounting screw. I had thought that the plastic clamps would slip under load, or possibly crack, but everything is robustly made, and I can use the tripod as a workhorse for whatever I need at the moment. It is even sufficiently steady that I can attach a camera gimbal and operate it through remote control. Depending upon the load, yes, a moderate wind can cause a little bit of sway, but there is less movement using this tripod than I have with my expensive, carbon-fiber unit. Three cheers for the inexpensive, built-like-a-tank tripod!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for full lights
reviews.reviewText: Super lightweight and can be sturdy just don’t overload. Nice to use for fill lights or your smartphone for quick videos. Fits convenient in most of my backpacks and camera bags

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a versatile tripod stand for your photography or video projects, the TARION Table Light Stand is definitely worth considering. With its durable metal construction and adjustable height of 130 cm, you can easily set up your lighting equipment or smartphone at the perfect angle for your shots. It's also lightweight and easy to transport, making it a great choice for on-the-go shoots. Overall, I highly recommend the TARION Table Light Stand for any photographer or videographer in need of a reliable and flexible tripod stand.
Por el precio, me esperaba algo de menor calidad. Está muy bien, estable y discreto. Lo usé para un proyector de 2kg, y lo sostiene sin problemas.
No es para muchas ostias, y si alargas el palo tambien subes el punto de grabedad por lo que un pequeño golpe lo conviertes en muy inestable, pero claro, con ese dinero milagros a Lourdes.
Per smartphone, led piccoli, per cose leggere fa il suo. Piccolo e comodo da trasportare
